alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 12:36PM PST until March 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY BELOW 6000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 6000 feet, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy winds Saturday could lead to some blowing/drifting snow, which could reduce visibility and further worsen travel conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
